org.dellroad.stuff.spring
Class PostCompletion

java.lang.Object
  org.dellroad.stuff.spring.PostCompletion

public final class PostCompletion
extends Object

Supports requesting the execution of post-completion callbacks when running within @PostCompletionSupport-annotated methods.

See @PostCompletionSupport for an example of how this class is normally used.

See Also:
PostCompletionSupport

Method Summary
static void execute(Callable action)
          Register a callback to be executed upon successful completion only.

          Register a post-completion callback.

Method Detail

execute

public static void execute(Runnable action)
Register a callback to be executed upon successful completion only.

Equivalent to: 

  execute(action, false);

Parameters:
action - action to invoke
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if action is null

execute

public static void execute(Runnable action,
                           boolean always)
Register a post-completion callback.

Parameters:
action - action to invoke
always - true to execute the action even upon unsuccessful completion (i.e., exception thrown)
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if action is null
IllegalStateException - if not running within a @PostCompletionSupport-annotated method.
